# Explanation of variables: missing values removed

```{r results='asis', warning=FALSE}
invisible(lapply(
  syms(exp_cols),
  explain_rmd,
  na.rm = TRUE,
  df = d_main
))
```

# Explanation of variables: missing values kept

```{r results='asis', warning=FALSE}
invisible(lapply(
  syms(exp_cols),
  explain_rmd,
  na.rm = FALSE,
  df = d_main
))
```

# MultivariÃ©

```{r, results='asis'}
d_curr <- d_main

fmlas <- list(
  thing ~ from + stuff,
  thing ~ from + other + stuff
)

purrr::walk(
  fmlas,
  function(fmla) {
    cat("## ")
    cat(format(fmla))
    cat("\n\n")
    cat(alg_reg_auto(d_curr, fmla, accuracy = 0.001))
    cat("\n\n")
  }
)
```
